title: Legolas, Prince of Mirkwood (1U51)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Elf
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	Archer. While skirmishing a Nazgul, Legolas is strength +3.
Lore:	“There was also a strange Elf clad in green and brown, Legolas, a messenger from his father, Thranduil, the King of the Elves of Northern Mirkwood.”
Rarity:	U
